#How to use tstdb v2.

= Build =

1) check out source

http://tstdb.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/v2/

2) compile

cd src
make

= Start =
./tst.sh start

tail -f log/* 
(check the log)

== Stop =
./tst.sh stop

= Configuration =

vim conf/tstserver.conf

when conf file changed, run './tst.sh stop' and then './tst.sh start'
